## UiSettingsType type

UI element type to represent the settings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type UiSettingsType = 'undefined' | 'json' | 'markdown' | 'number' | 'select' | 'boolean' | 'string' | 'array' | 'image';
```
